turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi, I would like to order a 'za please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: A pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, where would you like to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Picasso's on Elm

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, and what size "'za" would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: X-Large please

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And what would you like as toppings?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pineapple, pepperoni, and black olives

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, and would you like any sides or drinks with that order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, just the 'ZA

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great it looks like you already have an account with them on file so no need to give me any payment info

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's right!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And the receipt will be sent to your phone, is that ok?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Sure is, I just want my 'ZA!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Ok, well your "'za" will be ready in 25 minutes for pickup

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Wonderful!

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Will there be anything else for today?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that was it. Thank you very much

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: My pleasure, have a great day!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: You too, bye

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Bye
